label: ＢＵＲＮＡＢＬＥ ＧＡＲＢＡＧＥ
description:
About the collection(BURNABLE GARBAGE)
Put garbage into a town designated garbage bag and take it to your nearest collection place until 8am on the day of collection.
We will collect on public holidays as well.
Kitchen garbage needs to be well drained.
Plastic bags and other vinyl/tray products are considered as plastic garbage.
Papers and corrugated cardboard should be collected at the resource garbage or the major collection place. (We also receive large-size refuse.)

label: 資源ごみ
description:
Classification division by garbage type(Recyclable garbage)
●Metals
 Steel can
 Aluminum can
 Other metallic items
●Glass
 Bottle
 Colorless bottle
 Brown bottles
 Other bottles
●Papers
 Newspaper(Including fliers)
 Cardboard
 Other paper items(Books/Magazines/Hard papers)
●Branches and leaves
 Branches(A bundle should be less than 50cm)
 Grass/Leaves(Clean off all dirt. )

About the collection(Recyclable garbage)
Do not take to your usual collection place.
Tohata would not collect papers. Papers should be collected at the major collection place in your district. Please check the collection dates at your district circular notice or broadcast.
Use up all the contents inside a spraying can and make a hole to extract gas inside
Bottles should empty and cleaned inside. Take off caps and lids.
Metal items and glass items should be placed into their specified container.
Papers should be tied up tightly by a white paper cord.
Old clothes should be tied up tightly by a white paper cord.
Glass dishes should be classified as "unburnable garbage".

label: 埋立ごみ
description:
About the collection(UNBURNABLE GARBAGE)
Take garbage to your nearest collection place until 8am on the day of collection.
We will collect on public holidays as well.
Plastic garbage should be separated and placed into three types of collection nets that are distributed to each collection place.
Use the town recommended bag for unburnable garbage.
Products such as umbrellas and fluorescent lights that do not fit in a bag should be tied up in a bundle.

label: プラスチックごみ
description:
About the collection(PLASTIC GARBAGE)
Take garbage to your nearest collection place until 8am on the day of collection.
We will collect on public holidays as well.
Plastic garbage should be separated and placed into three types of collection nets that are distributed to each collection place.
Plastic garbage should be cleaned off.
Take caps and product labels off from plastic bottles.
All plastic garbage should be put into a collection bag directly. (Do not put into a plastic bag.)
